entry.title: Putin Threatens to Abandon Grain Deal, Further Squeeze Energy Supplies
entry.content: The Russian president said food exported from Ukraine wasn’t being sent to the poor countries that needed it and accused European nations of acting as colonizers.

entry.title: Ukrainian Troops Advance in East as Kyiv Seizes the Initiative
entry.content: An unexpected Ukrainian military offensive in the east near the country’s second-largest city of Kharkiv is gaining ground, testing Russian occupation forces that are also under pressure in southern Ukraine.
